Reviews.Title: “great hotel for a short break”
Reviews.Author: JoolsDerbyshire
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 4 nights april excellent central location didnt feel unsafe returning hotel midnight stayed 102 triple 2 singles pushed separate single front hotel balcony onto rambla excellent watching world rambla expected noisey 24 hours day double glazed french windows onto balcony job keeping reasonably quiet noisiest nights clean nicely furnished linen changed daily deal including breakfast enjoyed staff friendly professional hesitate recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Location, location, location!!”
Reviews.Author: SDowns09
Reviews.Content: excellent deal including breakfast hotel location didnt expect hotel fair isnt luxurious breakfast adequate quiet spotlessly clean daily linen changes staff lovely definitely stay hesitation recommending

Reviews.Title: “Third visit and still thumbs up!”
Reviews.Author: beachedwhale
Reviews.Content: spent 4 nights visit previously visited twice yes fairly basic beds low luxurious clean bathrooms spacious found staff friendly helpful complaints experience reception hotel location barcelona opposite opera house beside market metro ramblas price pay location value money definitely return recommend people looking luxury clean heart action atmosphere barcelona

Reviews.Title: “Superb location but very bad service”
Reviews.Author: enelym1978
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 2 nights couple friends location hotel perfect rambla liceu metro station youre halfway sea front center plaça catalunya barrio gotico hotel simple beds twin beds expect 3 european hotel bathroom clean tv time youre barcelona watch tv background music watch news annoying constantly bad signal message lose picture negative service worse customer service staff tried rip twice checkin cancelled wrong person stay night twin charge €150 paid €75 person desk extra single occupancy argued saying mistake cancelled wrong start credited money checked day friends checked front desk charged €150 person stayed twin night half night paid anyway drop bags join friends returned person bookings complained saying charging night tried charge lots arguments discussions eventually agreed pay €75 €150 night 3 hotel indeed bit steep staff care complaining direct phone email manager kept giving email address hotel stating managers private address hotel service awful recommend hotel friends

Reviews.Title: “Not again”
Reviews.Author: cschiefer
Reviews.Content: nearly time left booked hotel center pricy flor parks balcony floor floor balcony 05 square meters walls thin paper hear pipes elevators cleaning maids floor noises pay else bed offered thin blanket november temperatures sufficient floor offers meeting tv bar closed renovation besides nice location

Reviews.Title: “Huge disappointment”
Reviews.Author: chickenjools
Reviews.Content: booked hotel following favourable reviews travellers arrival fellow guest busily changing liking didnt bode prepared minded booked nonsmoking werent allocated discovered hotel couldnt change wasnt bothered reeked stale cigarette smoke bed double bedspread stains looked unpleasant found bedspread cupboard clean changed ourselves sheets cigarette burns fair hotel staff whom spoke apologetic pleasant throughout stay staff indifferent allegedly bar book hotel bar information hotel didnt facilities offer instructions bathroom ok outdated cleaned hairs bath ours shampoos etc towels thin definitely seen days towels stain looked mascara werent hotel looked treelined street actually nice imagine ramblas hotel noisy ours noisy sound scraping chairs wooden floor 4 am plumbing system noisy flushed lavatory shower heard pipes filling 20 minutes loud restaurant doesnt appear exist door hotel restaurant door breakfast terrible waiting staff surly food absolutely mediocre overpriced shame hotel probably nice hotel updating staff learn hospitality business actually complaining air views hotel barcelona wonderful city hotel standard stay location booked standard double mabe superior doubles suites doesnt alter poor hotel facilities overpriced wouldnt stay

Reviews.Title: “Do not trust staff”
Reviews.Author: donaldgregoryBelfast
Reviews.Content: tripadvisor profile visit barcelona regularly stayed couple ago friend checking wished luggage held flight late friend outside smoke reason looked staff hand hand baggage swiftly returned desk retrieve bags culprit bothered return return home wrote hotel twice help friend speaks reasonable spanish reply reminded looking hotel barcelona half term month ok hotel return security concerns

Reviews.Title: “Ideal location overlooking all the activity on La Rambla”
Reviews.Author: NPower_10
Reviews.Content: twin overlooking la rambla excellent staff friendly helpful close recommend le nits restaurant plaza reial la rambla food excellent reasonable quick snack day try placa st carrer de queues outside obvious reasons beer called zurich road top la rambla approx add €10 price similar drink la rambla

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Location & Clean Room”
Reviews.Author: Danglecherries
Reviews.Content: hotel perfectly located la rambla walking distance commence hop hop tours beach marina etc spotlessly clean air con bathroom nice size extremely clean receptionist helpful directions fault stay

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for a hassle-free stay in the heart of Barcelona”
Reviews.Author: Lochindorb
Reviews.Content: middle las ramblas opposite underground station yards wonderful cafes breathtaking fruit veg meat market central barcelona walkable clean furnished basic sized airconditioned soundproofed las ramblas night night spain won world cup noise bedroom aircon excellent reception didnt breakfast staff friendly courteous peace mind break bank wed recommend hotel minor glitch safe didnt note caution street cafes las ramblas charge outrageously doors perfect established cheap stay cafe proper phil

Reviews.Title: “Couldn't have hoped for anything better”
Reviews.Author: Purplegirl17
Reviews.Content: chose hotel cheap las ramblas werent expecting grand pleasantly surprised spacious comfy bed attractive decor bathroom clean shower strength lucky opposite hotel main street noise issues dont hotel busy street hours morning cultural district close harbour plenty restaurants close dont reviews complained staff staff helpful friendly recommended restaurant evening easy talk recommended friends

HotelInfo.Address: La Ramblas 70, 08002 Barcelona, Spain
